We are not distracted from the command, from Hak'ta and from the hell, we are different.
Yesterday, those who complained about the persecution of the state, today they are encouraging themselves in the same way by abusing the environment of democracy and freedom.
The way of politics, democracy and development; the path of terror is blood, death, and pain.
Those who insist on terrorism see what they deserve, and they will continue to see it.
